input.sentences: someone went on a walk through a small town .
they saw some decorations in the park .
they also saw a pretty little church
and took a walk through its graveyard .
output.sentences: Directly in front of me was the church.
But I couldn't get through the gates without my ID.
So I ran back to my hotel.
The church was empty by the time I arrived back.
So, I went to the grave site.
